wikipedia_page.main: Major General Sir David Boswell Egerton, 16th Baronet,  (24 July 1914 – 17 November 2010) was a British Army officer from the aristocratic Egerton family.

response: David Egerton was born on 19 October 1961 in Pinner, Middlesex, and from 1973 to 1980 attended Bishop Wordsworth's School.

link_mentions.page: List of foreign recipients of the Légion d'Honneur by country
response: *Major-General Sir David Egerton, Chevalier de la Légion d'honneur (1945);
*David Egerton (British Army officer) (1914–2010), British army officer
*Sir David Egerton (1914–2010), who succeeded his second cousin in the baronetcy in 2008.
*David Egerton (British Army officer) (1914–2010), British Army major general
